Uses of Interface
com.xuggle.mediatool.IMediaTool

Packages that use IMediaTool
com.xuggle.mediatool A simple API for to decoding, viewing and encoding media: tutorial here; start with ToolFactory. 
 

Uses of IMediaTool in com.xuggle.mediatool
 

Subinterfaces of IMediaTool in com.xuggle.mediatool
 interface IMediaWriter
          An IMediaCoder that encodes and decodes media to an IContainer, and can optionally read data for encoding from other IMediaGenerator objects.
 

Classes in com.xuggle.mediatool that implement IMediaTool
 class MediaToolAdapter
          An implementation of IMediaTool that forwards all IMediaListener events to listeners registered with MediaToolAdapter.addListener(IMediaListener).
